message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 20% of the money. What do you say?
You're being too generous with your first offer. I'll take a bigger share this time.
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money. You'll get 45% this time.
You're getting a bit more aggressive, I like it. But I'm not giving up yet.
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, just like you. I'll give you 40% this time, but that's as low as I'll go.
You're not budging, so I'll try to squeeze you dry. Take it or leave it.
